sentences.en: An expenditure for clothing will qualify as a trade or business expense.
sentences.cn: 服装费将可算作贸易或商务开支。

sentences.en: Conference rooms were equipped at great expense.
sentences.cn: 装备会议室花费巨大。

sentences.en: He borrowed £150,000 and used the money for legal expenses.
sentences.cn: 他借了15万英镑用于支付律师费。

sentences.en: He put Elizabeth's motel bill and airfare on his expense account.
sentences.cn: 他将伊丽莎白住汽车旅馆的费用和机票费用记在他的报销账目中。

sentences.en: He spared no expense to make the party a success.
sentences.cn: 为使宴会成功他不惜费用.

sentences.en: He's bought a big TV at vast expense so that everyone can see properly.
sentences.cn: 他花了很多钱买了台大电视，这样人人都可以看清楚了。

sentences.en: I think he's having fun at our expense.
sentences.cn: 我想他在拿我们寻开心。

sentences.en: I'll try to save him the expense of a flight from Perth.
sentences.cn: 我会设法替他省下要从珀斯飞来的机票费用。

sentences.en: It exposes the fallacy of short-term industrial gain at long-term environmental expense.
sentences.cn: 这暴露了以长久的环境破坏为代价换取短期工业利益的错误。

sentences.en: language courses which emphasize communication skills at the expense of literature.
sentences.cn: 强调交际技能而忽视文学的语言课程。

sentences.en: Officials say they'll spare no expense to prevent another riot.
sentences.cn: 官员说他们会不惜一切地阻止再次发生暴乱。

sentences.en: Owen was against it, on the grounds of expense.
sentences.cn: 欧文因费用问题对此表示反对。

sentences.en: Should architects continue to be trained for five years at public expense?
sentences.cn: 建筑师是否应该继续接受5年的公费培训呢？

sentences.en: telling jokes at my expense.
sentences.cn: 我被嘲弄了一番

sentences.en: The dealers profited shamefully at the expense of my family.
sentences.cn: 这些经销商通过损害我家人的利益不光彩地赚钱。

sentences.en: the document was printed at the taxpayer's expense.
sentences.cn: 文件的印刷费用由纳税人承担。

sentences.en: The garden was transformed at great expense .
sentences.cn: 花园改建花了一大笔费用。

sentences.en: The orchestra has more discipline now, but at the expense of spirit.
sentences.cn: 那个管弦乐团现在更有纪律性了，却丧失了灵魂。

sentences.en: The owner is making huge profits at the expense of downtrodden peasants.
sentences.cn: 物主靠压榨农民而赢得暴利。

sentences.en: the pursuit of profit at the expense of the environment.
sentences.cn: 以环境为代价的利润追求。

sentences.en: They are worth having but not at the expense of better services.
sentences.cn: 它们值得拥有，但是不能因此放弃更好的服务。

sentences.en: We set a limit to the expense of the trip.
sentences.cn: 我们规定了这次旅游的费用.

words.tran_cn: 可消费的；排出的；不重复使用的；可牺牲的

phrases.tran_cn: 由某人付费；由某人承担费用
n. 利息费用，利息支出
经营费用；营业费用；事业费
营业费用；企业管理费用

trans.tran_en: Expense is the money that something costs you or that you need to spend in order to do something
